purpose: The email announces an open postdoctoral researcher position in Trustworthy Distributed Software Systems at KU Leuven University.
evidence_sentences: The DistriNet research group at KU Leuven University in Belgium has an open position for a Post-doc researcher in Trustworthy Distributed Software Systems.
We are looking for a post-doc researcher with prior research experience and published results in the areas of Distributed Systems, Blockchain, Cloud or Web.
We offer a full-time salaried position as post-doc researcher (fixed-term contract with the outlook for a multi-year engagement).
